executive_summary: Audit of 10 onboarding and auth pages reveals CRITICAL failures in two areas: (1) Login and Register buttons use white instead of turquoise primary color, and (2) ZERO functional i18n implementation despite system being configured. Progress indicators are PERFECT (100% compliance). Form validation exists but lacks ocean accent styling. Hero sections universally use black gradients instead of MT Ocean theme. Overall compliance: 41%. VolunteerPage and UserGuidePage demonstrate excellent ocean theming patterns that should be replicated. IMMEDIATE action required on button colors and i18n before production deployment.
final_recommendation: Fix P0 critical items (button colors and core auth i18n) within 24 hours. Implement P1 items (hero gradients and validation styling) within 1 week. The foundation is solid - pages are well-structured with good animations and UX. Ocean theming needs systematic application following the excellent patterns already present in VolunteerPage and UserGuidePage.
